iplb_backend_setweight_help: For example, if back-end A has a weight of 8 and back-end B has a weight of 16, the latter will receive 2 x the amount of traffic as back-end A. Back-ends must be located in the same datacenter (PoP) for weight to impact both of them.

ip_addresses_grid_header: My public IP addresses and associated services
ip_alerts_spam_help: (port 25 blocked following spam activity detection on the IP address)
ip_alerts_antihack_help: (blocking the service due to suspected malicious activity)
ip_alerts_mitigation_help: (protection of the service experiencing a DDoS attack)
ip_table_header_service_help: OVHcloud service associated with the IP address. The service can be accessed via the associated IP address.
ip_table_header_ip_address_help: Public IP address associated with the service.
ip_table_header_country_help: The IP address country of origin. Available for geolocated IPs (Additional IPs) only.
ip_table_header_campus_help: The campus defines the location of the IP address associated with the service. In the case of Additional IPs, the campus also defines the location of the services on which the IP address can be transferred.
ip_table_header_reverse_help: The DNS record that enables reverse resolution (IP address to host name).
ip_table_header_virtual_mac_help: The MAC address used to route the IP address to a virtualised resource in bridge mode for compatible products.
ip_table_header_game_mitigation_help: Anti-DDoS game protection available for the service.
ip_table_header_organisation_help: An organisation represents the entity responsible for an IP block (for example, your company).
ip_table_header_alerts_help: IP address or Additional IP block alerts.
ip_mitigation_DEFAULT_help: Mitigation will be enabled automatically if an attack is detected.
ip_mitigation_PERMANENT_help: Permanent mitigation (Shield + Edge Network Firewall) is enabled.
ip_game_mitigation_ACTIVATED_help: The Anti-DDoS Game protection option is available for this service.
ip_firewall_NOT_CONFIGURED_help: Traffic does not pass through the Edge Network Firewall, and it has never been configured.
ip_firewall_DEACTIVATED_help: Traffic does not pass through the Edge Network Firewall.
ip_firewall_ACTIVATED_help: Traffic coming from outside the OVHcloud network passes through the Edge Network Firewall. Note: The Edge Network Firewall is enabled automatically whenever a DDoS attack is launched, and cannot be disabled before the attack ends.
ip_repricing_banner: The pricing for your additional IPv4 addresses is changing.
ip_repricing_banner_list_item_1: For newly ordered IPs, this change has been in effect since 06 October 2022.
ip_repricing_banner_list_item_2: For IPs ordered before 06 October 2022, the change will come into effect from 01 December 2022 onwards.
ip_unused_banner_text: You have unused IP addresses. Since IPv4 addresses are becoming increasingly scarce as a resource, please release them if you do not need them.
